projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

versions.description: Windows Platform Support, ListView updates, Vector overlays in maps
versions.name: Release 4.1.0

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
We have more new macros meant to make it easier to define getters/setters of common types like std::string, int32_t, uint32_t, double, bool.

These should be used when we can in place of the generated longer-forms.

https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile_windows/blob/master/Source/TitaniumKit/include/Titanium/detail/TiImpl.hpp#L278
fields.summary: Windows: Update module generator to use newest macros
